title: Update 5-min tutorial for Solr 5
description:
The new online tutorial will not work for Solr 5. There is no more collection1, which the example uses.

Placeholder to ensure this does not get forgotten in the 5.0 release process as the README drives new users to this tutorial. 

Also, should the tutorial be versioned given the significant difference between 4.10.2 and 5.0 experience?

comments.author: Yonik Seeley
comments.content:
The tutorial is very important for new users.  If they are new, they should start with the latest released version?
I guess we could stash a link to the Solr 4 tutorial if it's not too difficult, but it seems less important.

comments.author: Erik Hatcher
comments.content: The site/quickstart.mdtext can become the quickstart on the Solr site when Solr 5 is released.

comments.author: Erik Hatcher
comments.content: finally calling this done; been live for a few days now.

comments.author: Alexandre Rafalovitch
comments.content: Fixed long ago, but was not resolved and not closed.
